Posts.Content: cherub wrote: Hello lovely ladies, Just wanted to say hi, I am in the early stages of diagnosis of BC recurrence, had CT scan that shows a mediastinal mass 5cm and have multiple micro mets to the spin the largest 1cm waiting to see oncologist next week. Would love to hear from others who have similar DX thanks heaps Jennifer   I am living in the NOW Dx 5/18/2006, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, 1/27 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: newbie with neck lumps & bone mets cherub LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2008 07:42PM cherub wrote: Thanks Girls, Im sure ill enjoy getting to know you all over the next few years! It is crap to be in this ABC Club but I prefer to call it the Sisterhood! Elaine - try reading the book by Eckhart Tolle - A New Earth (Oprah's bookclub)  I am wading my way through it and it has brought me to a better place (Podcasts on itunes are great & free to down load)  it is so much easier to deal with Stage IV diagnosis when you only look at today  love Jennifer
